bill_title: to specify the amount of time that an ambulatory surgery center may retain a patient.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to specify the amount of time that an ambulatory surgery center may retain a patient. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 34-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: An ambulatory surgery center may retain a patient following a surgical procedure for up to seventy-two hours if it is medically necessary. 750 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.015 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.

action_log.status_text: First read in House and referred to
Scheduled for Committee hearing on this date
